selection_reasoning: Selected the three highest-performing basin-hopping implementations with different adaptive mechanisms and perturbation strategies. Also included our only successful trial from Generation 9 which uses a mathematical, pattern-based approach, and our original physics-based solution to maintain methodological diversity. This selection balances exploitation of our best-performing approaches while preserving exploration through diverse methods.

trial_selections.reasoning: Best overall score (2.634) using basin-hopping with sophisticated adaptive mode selection based on success history
Second-best score (2.633) with explicit stepsize decay and increase mechanisms, providing a different implementation of basin-hopping
Third-best score (2.633) with a simpler but effective basin-hopping implementation, offering implementation diversity
Only successful trial from generation 9 (2.580) using a mathematical, pattern-based approach with multiple initialization strategies
Original high-performer (2.612) using physics-based simulation, adding methodological diversity to our selection
